name: swarmui-downloader-helper-extension
description: Downloader helper extension for SwarmUI and Chrome

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:downloader && npm run build:chrome
scripts.build:chrome: node node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc -p tsconfig.chrome.json && node node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc -p tsconfig.chrome-tools.json && node .build-tools/build-installable.js
scripts.clean: rm -f Assets/DownloaderHelper.js Assets/DownloaderHelper.js.map Assets/Chrome/chrome-extension.js Assets/Chrome/chrome-extension.js.map Assets/Chrome/README.md .build-tools/build-installable.js .build-tools/build-installable.js.map
